name: Sound Solutions Internet
overview:
Specialising in small and medium businesses, Sound Solutions Internet offer a variety of website design, development and marketing services with particular emphasis on e-commerce.

Sound Solutions are based in Hessle, East Yorkshire, and provide a wide variety of services including web hosting, technical support, web design, web site development, online marketing, search engine optimisation as well as offline services such as print and radio advertising and general printing services.

Web sites developed by Sound Solutions are designed to be user and search engine friendly, to maximise sales or enquiries. Examples of companies using the company include a large online jewellery store, a designer clothing company, a shop selling tortoises and accessories for keeping them as pets, a company specialising in spares and repairs of vehicle tail-lifts and many more.
